00015 #ifndef _FONTS_H
00016 #define _FONTS_H
00017 
00018 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>
00019 
00020 
00021 /* select desired fonts. (Simply comment out those not needed) */
00022 #define EN_FIVE_DOT
00023 #define EN_SIX_DOT
00024 #define EN_SEVEN_DOT
00025 #define EN_NINE_DOT
00026 //#define EN_TEN_DOT
00027 #define EN_FIFTEEN_DOT
00028 #define EN_EIGHTEEN_DOT
00029 #define EN_FONT_MT1
00030 
00031 /* define number labels for the font selections */
00032 typedef enum
00033 {
00034 #ifdef EN_FIVE_DOT
00035         FONT_FIVE_DOT,
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #ifdef EN_SIX_DOT
00039         FONT_SIX_DOT,
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 #ifdef EN_SEVEN_DOT
00043         FONT_SEVEN_DOT,
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 #ifdef EN_NINE_DOT
00047         FONT_NINE_DOT,
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #ifdef EN_TEN_DOT
00051         FONT_TEN_DOT,
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #ifdef EN_FIFTEEN_DOT
00055         FONT_FIFTEEN_DOT,
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 #ifdef EN_EIGHTEEN_DOT
00059         FONT_EIGHTEEN_DOT,
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 #ifdef EN_FONT_MT1
00063         FONT_MT1,
00064 #endif
00065 
00066         FONT_COUNT
00067 } FONT_BASE;
00068 
00069 struct FONT_DEF 
00070 {
00071    uint8_t store_width;            /* glyph storage width in bytes */
00072    uint8_t glyph_height;                 /* glyph height for storage */
00073    const prog_char *glyph_table;      /* font table start address in memory */
00074    uint8_t fixed_width;            /* fixed width of glyphs. If zero */
00075                                          /* then use the width table. */
00076    const prog_char *width_table;         /* variable width table start adress */
00077    uint8_t glyph_beg;                            /* start ascii offset in table */
00078    uint8_t glyph_end;                            /* end ascii offset in table */
00079    uint8_t glyph_def;                            /*  for undefined glyph  */
00080 };
00081 
00082 /* font definition tables for the fonts */
00083 extern const struct FONT_DEF fonts[FONT_COUNT];
00084 
00085 /* glyph bitmap and width tables for the fonts */ 
00086 #ifdef EN_FIVE_DOT
00087   extern const uint8_t __attribute__ ((progmem)) five_dot_glyph_table[];
00088   extern const uint8_t five_dot_width_table[];
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #ifdef EN_SIX_DOT
00092   extern const uint8_t __attribute__ ((progmem)) six_dot_glyph_table[];
00093   extern const uint8_t six_dot_width_table[];
00094 #endif
00095 
00096 #ifdef EN_SEVEN_DOT
00097 #define DEG_CHAR ('~'+1)
00098   extern const uint8_t __attribute__ ((progmem)) seven_dot_glyph_table[];
00099   extern const uint8_t seven_dot_width_table[];
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 #ifdef EN_NINE_DOT
00103   extern const uint8_t  __attribute__ ((progmem)) nine_dot_glyph_table[];
00104 #endif
00105 
00106 #ifdef EN_TEN_DOT
00107   extern const uint8_t  __attribute__ ((progmem)) ten_dot_glyph_table[];
00108 #endif
00109 
00110 #ifdef EN_FIFTEEN_DOT
00111   extern const uint8_t __attribute__ ((progmem)) fifteen_dot_glyph_table[];
00112   extern const uint8_t  fifteen_dot_width_table[];
00113 #endif
00114 
00115 #ifdef EN_EIGHTEEN_DOT
00116   extern const uint8_t __attribute__ ((progmem)) eighteen_dot_glyph_table[];
00117   extern const uint8_t  eighteen_dot_width_table[];
00118 #endif
00119 
00120 #ifdef EN_FONT_MT1
00121   extern const uint8_t __attribute__ ((progmem)) font_mt1_glyph_table[];
00122   extern const uint8_t  font_mt1_width_table[];
00123 #endif
